string.text: I want to fight. Who will be my opponent this time?
There's no one to fight with. Come later, when we get new mutants.
It is customary to pay for participating in the battles. Pay 1000 rubles.
Okay, here's the money.

Well, the first fight. Your opponent is the same piece of meat as you are. Got here because of debts. He was given a choice: either go out and fight, or go to the nearest anomaly. So he will fight like a dog driven into a corner. Concerning the equipment today, let me think, yeah - you'll fight with pistols, the cheapest. Right, and two magazines, I think it will suffice. Go kick his ass or go feed the dogs, it's not a big choice. Go ahead.
I'm ready.
I'm not ready yet.

The previous fight didn't mean anything yet. You're still a piece of meat that a decent man won't put a clip on. If you want to make good money, you have to perform more than once. Your opponent also passed the first round and did it fast enough, and his opponent was more serious than yours. Well, to be honest, I don't like him; he kills very quickly, and the public doesn't like it. So go ahead and show me what you can do. After this battle, the stakes will increase, it remains only to survive. Go!
I'm ready.
I'm not ready yet.

Well well. You are not such a weakling as you seem at first sight. It's time to test you in a fair fight. Against you are two opponents, the first - Swede, the second I don't remember the name. They were specially put in a pair, they don't terribly like each other. So you don't have to be afraid of team play on their part. Rather, they will shoot each other. Choice of weapons today, guns, so look: do not try to show off, otherwise you will be collected in parts. The stakes against you are ten to one, if you win - you will earn excellent money. Let's do this!
I'm ready.
I'm not ready yet.

Now I can say with certainty that you are a fighter. It's time for a team performance. You'll be put against two newcomers, two brothers. They have not played yet, but since they are brothers, they had to shove them into team fights. You can not rely on special help on their part, so count only on yourself. Against you played the team played, the contenders for the finals of this season. Dangerous guys. The weapons are mixed, one of them has an automatic shotgun - be very careful with it. Come on, good luck, you'll need it.
I'm ready.
I'm not ready yet.

Today you have an unusual fight. Even the military heard about your feats and sent two of their fighters. Yes, do not be surprised, the military's also involved in this. There is even a general among the spectators. These guys are from the special forces, or rather from the riot police. And they are armed appropriately. Be careful, they have strong armor. I will not leave you naked either. You will receive armor, Freedom armor, that they would choke. Suit's light, so it will not interfere with running. Show them that our brothers are no pushovers. Godspeed!
I'm ready.
I'm not ready yet.

Today you have a show fight. Duty have caught a gang which would give no rest to stalkers in the Wild Territory. Took them at night, so that almost all alive remained. They will still be put to the wall, so I convinced Duty to give them a chance. Who survives-will go to prison outside the Zone, better than to die. They are armed with crap, mostly pistols and saw-offs, but it's six of them, so don't get stupid. Let's go!
I'm ready.
I'm not ready yet.

You've almost reached the finale. You have to fight against a Master stalker. Yes, he's alone, but he is in an exoskeleton, and armed with an assault rifle, if you get under his line of fire - consider yourself a corpse. You are in for a surprise, which I can't tell you, but my advice to you is - get ready, the fight will be difficult. The winner of this fight will qualify for the final - the Death Fight. Onwards!
I'm ready.
I'm not ready yet.

Congratulations! You reached the final match. There's only one fight remaining - a death match. In this battle, every man is for himself. Besides you four more stalkers take part in the fight, all the masters, all in exoskeletons. Now everything will be fair - you will have exactly the same equipment. No first aid kits and bandages. Ready? Prove that you are the best! GO!
I'm ready.
I'm not ready yet.
Great! There is a new fight for you.
Hey! You paid for the fight and then you ran away. But if you don't fight, then who will?
Take a walk for an hour or two, the arena is not ready yet.
You've become a Master!!!\n
You won! Here is your reward!
You're not experienced enough for this fight!
I want to fight. What kind of creature you got this time?
I don't have that much money.
Then get out of here, stalker.
It's two thousand if you want to participate.
Good, here's the money.
I already paid you.
I don't have that much money.
Well, don't waste my time.
Gimme three thousand for participating and the bloodsucker is all yours.
Okay, here's the money.
I don't have that much money.
Don't waste my time, stalker.
Not so fast. For starters, pay five thousand to participate.
Alright, here's the money.
I don't have that much money.
Oh look, I've found a beggar.
The participation fee is 5000 rubles.
Very well, here's your money.
I wish I had that much money.
Did they clean you out there?
There's a pseudodog. This specimen is large, but fairly beaten. But furious, like my mother-in-law. Well, are you ready?

Good. One more thing. You have to choose the time in which you have to kill the mutant, and with it the winnings that you will get for the victory. If you manage to do it in the selected time - you win, if you don't - you lose. The smaller the selected time, the greater the gain.
Thirty seconds and a trifecta.
One and a half minutes and double the prize.
Without time limits. Half of the winnings.
I've changed my mind.
As you wish, but I won't give you the money back.
I'll try. Release your dog.
Dog? That's all you got?
Look, our little doggie girl got scared. Come on, don't be upset.
There's a freak in a gas mask. They call him a snork. Superficially skinny and weak, but agile, like your Jackie Chan. Ready?
Excellent. Now everything is ready. Go to the arena.
Release your snork.
Oh, no. I'm sick of those.
Scared of a half-rotten freak in a gas mask?
This time, this is real luck.We caught a young bloodsucker. Still stupid, but with all the bad habits.
Come on, prepare the bloodsucker.
Bloodsucker? Oh hell no.
What? You feel sorry for bloodsuckers? When did you manage to sign up for Freedom?
This time we have a short, fat man in a black raincoat, the locals call him a burer.
Small and fat? Piece of cake. Bring out this freak.
I heard about these things. I'll pass.
He hardly gets to your waist. And you're scared?
Oh, this is a special case. I don't know where he was caught, but he's just an animal. It's how it is called - the Beast.
Deal. I will spare him from suffering.
No thanks, I'm not suicidal.
Hmm ... Actually, frankly, I'm a little afraid of him myself. But I'm not fighting in the arena, so what's the difference?
I've got a couple of questions.
Spit it out.
No more questions.
What is this place?
This is my business in these parts. The Arena - a place where any stalker can test his strength in duels with mutants.And if he shows sufficient skill, he can make money.
Where do you get all these living mutants?

By an agreement with Duty. Previously, they were finishing off all those they could find, and then I offered them money in exchange for the wounded, weakened mutants. They quickly agreed. Since then, I have an almost inexhaustible source of monsters.
Where are you from?

Where am I from. I myself do not know what to consider my homeland. I've spent a long time in Africa, then several years in Ecuador. Then I heard about this wonderful place, and realized that here you can make some real good money. And here I am.
What exactly are the rules?

Oh, the rules are very simple. I invented them myself. There is a cage, a mutant is released from it. You pay money, and you can also choose the time in which you'll kill the monster. If you manage to make it on time - you will receive a prize. If you run out of time, I keep the money.\nBut fighting against mutants - this is so, you know, for entertainment. Much more interesting - fighting against people. Duty catch bandits and other bastards and give them the opportunity to fight in the arena in exchange for freedom. Sometimes, ordinary stalkers decide to test their strength here. In any case, if someone leaves the arena alive - he gets a decent reward. And if he continues to win in the next battles - more and more stalkers come to see the battles, and the winning party gets even greater gains.
Good to see you, stalker. Welcome to the Arena.
So what are you waiting for? Move in the cage!
Sorry man, there is no one to fight with. Wait a day or two, until we catch a new mutant.
There you are! Not bad, not bad. Here is your winnings. If you want to fight again for money - come up any time.
Sorry, bro, but you lost. Come back next time, if you want.
What's up! How's it going?
What do you need, stalker?
Want to buy something, or what?
Hello, man, how is the Zone? Um... I hope you need to fix something. I'm pretty broke right now...
